data.text: I was the primary and only developer for The McBride Design Co.. This project was built with CraftCMS, TailwindCSS, and Twig.

When it came to UI interations and animations, I was able to use my knowledge of CSS and Javascript to create a unique experience for the user. The designs were provided statically without any animations or interactions note or guides, so I was able to use my own creativity to bring the designs to life.
Homepage and navigation animations and interactions

The client wanted an easter egg for the changing staff picktures. Initially the designer came up with a solution where the user would have to hover over the images to see the easter egg. After inital UX testing, I found users were not hovering over the images, so I came up with a solution where the easter egg would be triggered after X amount of time.
